name: Pastis 51 French Bistro Carafe
description:
Vintage Pastis bottle.
Bottle is in excellent to mint condition, as you can see in the photo.

Carafe measures 7 1/2" x 3 1/2" x 2 1/3"

All shipping is via USPS Priority with tracking # (2-3 Days Domestic, 5-10 Days Overseas).

WORLDWIDE SHIPPING is available. Contact me for cost

name: Hollywood Regency Moroccan Square Plates
description:
Square ceramic plates perfect for appetizers, condiments, olives, almonds, small salads, desserts, etc.

4 1/4" X 4 1/4"

name: Absinthe/Hors d'Oeuvres Number Plates- Set of 4
description:
These charming little dishes were used in French cafes & bistros to serve absinthe and pastis, but are perfect for serving tapas or other nibbles. 

The price was printed on the dishes and the dishes were totaled for the tab!

These will go great with the Pastis Glasses in my separate listing.

This is for a set of 4.

name: 23 Francs Cafe Glasses, Set of 4
description:
French bistrot Pastis glasses with red and blue detail and 23f for 23 francs to total the bill.
These are about the size of a juice glass.
This listing is for a set of four glasses.
Made in France
dimensions 2.5"x2.5"x4.5"
